reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress beautiful, with one noting it looks more expensive than its price point, and they appreciate its flattering design, particularly the back swoop.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect Black Dress for a Wedding — Elegant, Flattering, and Comfortable!
items.body: I bought this black dress for a wedding, and it was absolutely perfect. The fit was true to size, super flattering, and comfortable enough to wear all night. The fabric has a nice weight and flow to it, it looks way more expensive than it is. I loved how versatile it felt simple enough to style different ways, but classy and timeless for an event. I received several compliments, and it photographed beautifully too. Pros: elegant fit, comfortable fabric, perfect for weddings or formal events Cons: just make sure to steam it before wearing for the best look Read more
items.author: Sandra Zarate

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Not for tall IBTC! Hole at seam
items.body: The media could not be loaded. Ordered this dress to try and avoid spending $100+ on a bridesmaid dress. Was not made for my body type (6ft/36B/29”waist/40”hips) and had construction issues. Pros: fabric color and feel is actually pretty nice Cons: the bust construction is strange, the gathering is placed very close to the center so will not accommodate most body types; not cut on the bias so the stretch is weird over the hips and gaps at waist; would be maxi maybe up to 5’8”; mine came with a tear where the bodice joins the skirt by the zipper, so quality and longevity is a concern. Overall I probably would suggest someone try this dress, i image it would be very pretty on the right body type! Only concern is the quality as mine came already damaged, which i took an additional star off for. Read more
items.author: Turner

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful Fit, Great Quality & Worth Every Penny!
items.body: This satin dress was absolutely perfect for my surprise hula dance for my husband! The fit was just right—not too tight, not too loose—and the length made it easy to move and dance gracefully without any fuss. I did have to get it altered- I’m short 5ft so it’s expected. The material had that perfect silk-like feel—soft, smooth, and just the right thickness so nothing showed through. There’s not much stretch, but the fit was spot-on so I didn’t need it. It looked and felt so elegant, and I honestly felt amazing in it. For the price, the quality completely exceeded my expectations. It felt way more expensive than it was—definitely great value for money. I’d 100% buy this again in another color! Read more
items.author: Ilea Beddow

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Seriously do not buy.
items.body: Unfortunately a horrible dress poorly sewn, terrible quality fabric and a super awkward cut :/ dress had a loose seam under the Brest section and tension of the seams were uneven causing weird and awkward bulging of seams, the fabric was literally stained by water, did not even get past steaming the dress before I had an issue, but you can NOT steam the dress because the fabric will never ever let go of a wrinkle without doing so, and don’t even think about wearing it in the summer because sweat would without a doubt show up, and there is a seam that’s not very viable in the photos that goes diagonally below the hips and goes all around, boy is that the weirdest thing ever, and makes it look like it doesn’t fit no matter what!! Then the blob and back balance is SO hard to find, and the stings to tie in the back are so unnecessarily long Read more
items.author: audriella

items.title: 2.0 out of 5 stars size up
items.body: this did not zip all the way. I guess silk doesn’t like my body, cause I seem to have this problem a lot. The top made my chest look great, but the dress has absolutely zero give so I suggest ordering a size up. Read more
items.author: Madison toothman

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful but not made for D cups or bigger
items.body: The dress is beautiful and seems like a good quality. I’m a 40g bra and 206 lb. Everywhere fit great but the boobs in the XL. Definitely not made for any bigger than a C maybe D cup. Read more
items.author: Samantha

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this dress!
items.body: The color of this dress is amazing! The fit is gorgeous! It needs to be steamed before you wear it but it doesn’t wrinkle during the night. There is no stretch, you just slip into it. The back is very low. I had to have mine altered and was able to loop to go around my strap. Read more
items.author: Mommygee

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Exceeded my expectations
items.body: Why did you pick this product vs others?: This dress was true to size and elegant looking. It definitely is snug, but not uncomfortable. I will say that if you have a smaller chest, then you might not fill out the top completely, but it still looks good. Material quality: Thick, quality material and not super see through Read more
items.author: A R

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Cocktail Maxi Sleeveless V Neck Formal is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Cocktail Maxi Sleeveless V Neck Formal is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Brown, Army, Aqua, Blue, Burgundy, Gooseyellow, Silver Gray, Fuchsia, Rose, Black, Champagne, Sage, Orange, Dark Green. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
